divs: Sighting DetailsI walked out of my patio to the back yard to have a cigarret. I looked up and seen what looked like a normal star. All of a sudden it went from (I am using these items as a scale of measuring) from the size of a pencil erasuer, grew to the size of a tennis ball, got really bright,then shrunk to nothing and dissapeared. I have never seen anything like that before and am curious as to what it could have been. Any explaination as to what it could have been would be cool!.
trends: There have been 45 other sightings in Grand Rapids
There were no other sightings in Grand Rapids on or around April 19th 2010
Summary: Looked like a star that grew big then shrunk to nothing.
